20101203082202.111|20101203082203.222|CCO|        MEDICAL CONDITION
20101203082203.222|20101203082204.333|CCO|      THAT CAN TAKE SO MUCH

20101203082219.571|20101203082221.000|CCO|      SO MUCH OUT OF YOU,
20101203082221.000|20101203082222.111|CCO|        ASK YOUR DOCTOR
20101203082222.111|20101203082223.222|CCO|        ABOUT PRISTIQ.
20101203082223.222|20101203082224.333|CCO|           PRISTIQ IS
20101203082224.333|20101203082225.444|CCO|    A PRESCRIPTION MEDICINE
20101203082225.444|20101203082226.556|CCO|  PROVEN TO TREAT DEPRESSION.
20101203082226.556|20101203082227.667|CCO|   PRISTIQ IS THOUGHT TO WORK
20101203082227.667|20101203082228.778|CCO|    BY AFFECTING THE LEVELS
20101203082228.778|20101203082229.889|CCO| OF TWO CHEMICALS IN THE BRAIN,
20101203082229.889|20101203082231.000|CCO| SEROTONIN AND NOREPINEPHRINE.
20101203082231.000|20101203082232.111|CCO|  TELL YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY
20101203082232.111|20101203082233.222|CCO|  IF YOUR DEPRESSION WORSENS
20101203082233.222|20101203082234.333|CCO|  OR YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES
20101203082234.333|20101203082235.444|CCO|       IN MOOD, BEHAVIOR,
20101203082235.444|20101203082236.556|CCO|    OR THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE.
20101203082236.556|20101203082237.667|CCO|  ANTIDEPRESSANTS CAN INCREASE
20101203082237.667|20101203082238.778|CCO|       SUICIDAL THOUGHTS
20101203082238.778|20101203082239.889|CCO|   AND BEHAVIORS IN CHILDREN,
20101203082239.889|20101203082241.000|CCO|    TEENS AND YOUNG ADULTS.
20101203082241.000|20101203082242.429|CCO|    PRISTIQ IS NOT APPROVED
20101203082242.429|20101203082243.857|CCO|    FOR CHILDREN UNDER 18.
20101203082243.857|20101203082245.286|CCO|DO NOT TAKE PRISTIQ WITH MAOIS.
20101203082245.286|20101203082246.714|CCO|         TAKING PRISTIQ
20101203082246.714|20101203082248.143|CCO|   WITH NSAID PAIN RELIEVERS,
20101203082248.143|20101203082249.571|CCO|  ASPIRIN, OR BLOOD THINNERS
20101203082249.571|20101203082251.000|CCO|  MAY INCREASE BLEEDING RISK.
20101203082251.000|20101203082252.250|CCO|        TELL YOUR DOCTOR
20101203082252.250|20101203082253.500|CCO|  ABOUT ALL YOUR MEDICATIONS,
20101203082253.500|20101203082254.750|CCO| INCLUDING THOSE FOR MIGRAINE,
20101203082254.750|20101203082256.000|CCO|     TO AVOID A POTENTIALLY
20101203082256.000|20101203082257.250|CCO|  LIFE-THREATENING CONDITION.

20101203083014.333|20101203083015.444|CCO|>> Dave: IT'S MORE LIKE SURFING,
20101203083015.444|20101203083016.556|CCO|ISN'T IT?
